subject: Re: Negative Entities?
author: Misty
full_text:
I see more "evil" amongst the living than anwhere else. As for negative 
speaking entities, I tend to ignore them the same as the live negs. 
Sometimes its just a part of a persons character to take the negative 
approach. The same goes for cussing, some people do it more than others.

Misty


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dmikolay" <dmikolay@...> wrote:
>
> Has anyone had anything "evil" come through?
>
